about_the_game:
The third ASMR installment of an alternate reality story different from the main Gachi-Natsu story is here!

With a total running time of about 58 minutes, it features superb realism, with environmental sounds and water sounds that change depending on the situation. It also comes with both sound effects and no sound effects versions, so you can enjoy it at your leisure in the atmosphere of your choice.

*This is a Japanese-language audio track only.

Track#01

When you get home, your macho friend from yesterday, Atsushi Kenzaki, greets you.

As soon as he gets home, he starts to mock you, who is a masochistic “you” who looks like he wants something, and starts to abuse you with a handjob.

Track#02

Today, you go out with Atsushi on a crowded train with a vibrator inserted into your asshole.

While being whispered in the ear so that those around you can't hear, the training molester play that will end your life if you get caught begins.

Track#03

Even though you've been showing off your masochism, you refuse to admit that you're a masochist.

So Atsushi proposes a sex match. If Atsushi punishes your cock with his asshole and you ejaculate, you lose.

Track#04

For you, who has lost the sex match and been proven to be a masochist, Atsushi has bought a thick dildo for anal training.

Just imagining what would happen if something like this was inserted into you... the perverted masochist “you” gets excited just thinking about it.

Track#05

“Abusive Ear Licking Voice”

The masochist “you” begs for ear licking, so Atsushi licks you all over while abusing you.

content_descriptors.notes: Male homosexuality, undressing, sexual activity, abusive language,SM acts, molestation play, BDSM
